About Us
Our Team
Our amazing team of service providers includes Circle of One Marketing, Socially Buzz, New Gen Solutions, Ecessories by Ellen, and We Do Events, all coming together to make the Grace Jamaican Jerk Festival unforgettable!
For information:
info@circleofonemarketing.com
about us
JAMAICAN JERK FESTIVAL USA, INC.
Jamaican Jerk Festival USA, Inc.,was established to develop and produce Jerk festivals and related events throughout the United States and other global markets. The team of Managing Partners all bring various areas of expertise to the organization, working in harmony to execute successful events. The annual Jamaican Jerk Festivals in Miramar, Florida and Queens, New York, have evolved as major events, attracting all ethnicities and key demographics. It is the mission of Jamaican Jerk Festival USA, Inc. to set standards and work with other organizations in promoting this uniquely Jamaican culinary art form, maintaining and protecting its authenticity globally.
